name: fetch-build-artifact
description: Fetch build artifacts from the server or a file share
helpMarkDown:
Requires **Allow Scripts to Access OAuth Token** to be **enabled**.

Having Problems? Please [create an issue on our Github](https://github.com/BoolBySigma/FetchBuildArtifact/issues) and we will try to help you.
author: Bool (by Sigma)

inputs.name: project
inputs.label: Project
inputs.helpMarkDown: Project from where to fetch the build artifact.

inputs.name: buildDefinitionId
inputs.label: Build Definition
inputs.helpMarkDown: Build definition from where to fetch build artifact.

inputs.name: artifactName
inputs.label: Build Artifact Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the artifact to fetch, eg. 'drop'.

inputs.name: targetDirectory
inputs.label: Target Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: The directory where to download the artifact. Leaving it blank defaults to source root directory and is equal to using $(Build.SourcesDirectory).
